body: @blur12 fr smh like is he stupid...? Also @Crizy I read doujins for the story/plot lol. If it's just a random fuck scene without an atleast okay plot, that's a big turnoff for me. I also dont enjoy most NTR, it gets me frustrated and depressed sometimes.
